column4: sexcoptor if your computer supports booting from usb device (you may have to set the boot order in bios) you should be fine, I haven't seen a computer that wouldn't boot from usb in a very long time, so I'd try setting up the boot order in bios, some computers will give you a boot menu if you press escape at post as wel
if i hit f12 i get a boot menu, and there's the option of "usb flash device", but that just seems to sit and do nothing
dang man I'm at a loss I'd set something up here and see about it, but I'm in the middle of building my first server
but is it possible to "burn" the ubuntu cd to a usb pen drive?
